Detailed Description

This class provides a default status listener. It is useful for block status response interception so that control messages execution can be synchronous.

Member Function Documentation

int32 uStreamLib::DefaultStatusListener::getStatusMessage (  smessage *  sm,
bool  wait
)  [inline]
 

This method allows to get a status message after having sent a control message to a block.

Parameters:
sm a pointer to an smessage structure (output parameter).
wait true means wait until a message is present (if wait is true, this method blocks, otherwise it is non blocking).
Returns:
SUCCESS or FAILURE if no status messages are present in the queue.

int32 uStreamLib::DefaultStatusListener::notifyStatusMessage (  smessage *  sm  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Notification method. This has been overridden by this class so that status messages are stored into an internal queue.
